TopicTitle: How to know when an Abort has been triggered

Articles.Content:
I need to know if an abort has been triggered, so that I don't trigger it again.  This is really only necessary so that I don't display an abort message if the abort has already been triggered.

I haven't found any way yet, was wondering if someone could help.

Thank you in advance

 

I figured it out, I didn't realize that the following would work: 

if (vessel.ActionGroups[KSPActionGroup.Abort])
{
}
